## ChildHandshake() function

Initiate the handshake from the Child side

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ChildHandshake<M extends MethodsType>(messenger: Messenger, localMethods?: M): Promise<Connection>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  messenger | [Messenger](./post-me.messenger.md) | The Messenger used to send and receive messages from the other end |
|  localMethods | M | The methods that will be exposed to the other end |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Connection](./post-me.connection.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A Promise to an active [Connection](./post-me.connection.md) to the other end
